div.p: What I’d like to do next is expand, I think we’re at the stage now of being established for 13 years to sort of expand outside Gloucestershire
I mean one of our main goals really is to be the best security company, or man guarding security company, in the Southwest and I think
we’ve got some good opportunities to do that because we do work for some corporate companies and it would be nice to sort of break into
Bristol, it would be nice to break out let’s say in the Swindon area and actually going down towards the Plymouth area
so I think we’ve got our long-term goals in place it’s just making sure we do it at the right time without overstretching ourselves.
